attributes.action: get Mr Darling to curb the proposed RBS bonuses now and say good bye to the current board
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Darling needs to curb the proposed RBS bonuses now and say good bye to the current board.
We should not allow the RBS board to blackmail the taxpayers and Government. Rules need to be imposed about the state owned banking bonus structures, now is the time to impose them. We have heard lots of talk about the need to change the bonus existing culture, here is an opportunity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
